1.title: Keep Your Money Yourself!
1.subtitle: AND BECOME UNSEIZABLE: ONLY YOU HAVE ACCESS TO YOUR SECURED WALLET.

2.title: Place Your Funds in a Rewarding Account
2.subtitle: AND BE REWARDED FROM THE VERY FIRST SECOND.

3.first_subtitle: YOUR IBEx WALLET ADAPTS TO YOUR PREFERRED CURRENCY.
3.title: Stay Informed
3.subtitle: ABOUT THE NATURE OF THE PRODUCTS OFFERED BY CLICKING ON THE INFO POINTS:

login.title: Welcome
login.subtitle: You are one step away from creating your sovereign account for free!

onboarding_1.title: Set Up Currency Display and Notifications
onboarding_1.money_question: Would you like a general display of amounts in Euros or Dollars?
onboarding_1.money_question_helper: To help you, amounts converted for display (according to the chosen currency) will be preceded by an asterisk (*).
onboarding_1.notifications_question: Would you like to enable notifications?
onboarding_1.notifications_question_helper: Stay ahead and take advantage of the best investment opportunities.
onboarding_1.language_question: In which language would you like to use the application?

onboarding_2.title: Your Money Works for You.
onboarding_2.subtitle_3: and earn liquid interest from the first second, not exposed to exchange rates.

onboarding_3.title: Access Your Account
onboarding_3.subtitle: Open or access an existing account with one click:

onboarding_4.title: Fund Your Account
onboarding_4.subtitle_angleEUR: Place your funds in a EURO rewarding account via bank card, Apple Pay, or Google Pay.
onboarding_4.subtitle_angleUSD: Place your funds in a US DOLLAR rewarding account via bank card, Apple Pay, or Google Pay.
onboarding_4.subtitle_onRamp: Place your funds in your Current Account via bank card, Apple Pay, or Google Pay.

transactions.title: Your Transaction History
transactions.no_transactions_1: You haven't made any transactions yet.
transactions.no_transactions_2: Fund your current account or make an investment to get started.
transactions.copied_link: A link to the transaction has been copied to your clipboard

disclaimer: By continuing, you confirm that you have read and accepted

amount_error.title: Incorrect Amount
amount_error.message: Please enter an amount between 5 and 100.

disclaimer.description: Amounts are rounded to the nearest cent (2 decimal places).

main_account.title: Your Current Account
main_account.description_1: Be the true owner of your funds, only you can interact with your sovereign Current Account.
main_account.description_2: You can move money from it to your rewarding accounts.

investment_account.title: Your Investments
investment_account.description_1: This investment behaves like a savings account, but better!
investment_account.description_2: Lock your funds and earn interest from the first minute. Withdraw at any time.
investment_account.disclaimer: Estimated annual yield and not guaranteed.

swap_cc_to_usd.title: This Operation Requires Your Attention
swap_cc_to_usd.message: You are about to move {{amount}} € from your Current Account to the US DOLLAR Rewarding Account.

swap_cc_to_euro.title: This Operation Requires Your Attention
swap_cc_to_euro.message: You are about to move {{amount}} € from your Current Account to the EURO Rewarding Account.

swap_usd_to_cc.title: This Operation Requires Your Attention
swap_usd_to_cc.message: You are about to move {{amount}} € from the US DOLLAR investment to your Current Account.

swap_euro_to_cc.title: This Operation Requires Your Attention
swap_euro_to_cc.message: You are about to move {{amount}} € from the EURO investment to your Current Account.

inactivity.title: Session Expired
inactivity.message: You have been inactive for more than 5 minutes. Please log in again.

onramp.title: Fund Your Account
onramp.subtitle: Place your funds in your Current Account via bank card, Apple Pay, or Google Pay.

offramp.title: Withdraw from Your Account
offramp.subtitle: You can retrieve funds from your account by withdrawing via bank card, bank transfer, or Google Pay.
